p: It is already known that PEL and LAT have antimicrobial activities [ 3, 14]. However, the main goal of the present study was to understand whether the combination of both could prove as antimicrobial drug. Therefore, we used Gram positive bacterium, S. aureus (0.5 × 10 6 CFU/ml), and Gram negative bacterium, E. coli (0.5 × 10 6 CFU/ml) cultures that were treated with LAT at the MIC of 1 μg/ml or PEL at the MIC of 10 μg/ml. Bacterial growth was evaluated 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 and 20 h after treatment.
